description: The file is a React component named BookDetails which displays detailed information about a specific book, selected based on URL parameters. It includes handling for image loading errors, fallback images, and navigation links.

methods.name: BookDetails
methods.description: React functional component that shows detailed information for a book, with fallback image handling.

methods.name: handleImgError
methods.description: Handles image load errors by replacing the image source with a fallback.
